Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.adversaryMove

Class AdversaryMove

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.adversaryMove.AdversaryMove
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstructionManagerTest.MyCard.AdversaryTestMove, MovementManagerTest.MyCard.AdversaryTestMove, MovementObserverTest.MyAdversaryObserver
public class AdversaryMove
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing a Player's Adversary Movement Observer and providing all the operations it needs to evaluate an Opponent's Movement move correctness.
Author:
AndreaAltomare

      checkers - Checkers for moves

  • Method Details

    • checkMove

      public boolean checkMove​(Move move, Worker worker) throws LoseException
      This method check for the correctness of the Opponent's move provided. If the Card's power does not modify the rule set, any Opponent's move is allowed by default (by others Player point of view).
      Parameters:
      move - (Opponent's move to check)
      worker - (Opponent's Worker who has executed the move)
      Returns:
      (Opponent move is allowed ? true : false)
      Throws:
      LoseException - Exception thrown when a Player loses

    • getParentCard

      public Card getParentCard()
